subject: Re: Delete a particular line from file
body:
Yes i got it.. it works fine well. 


Thanks a lots..
Siva



> Hello,
> 
> Here you may try to do,
> while() {
>      chomp;
>      $arrskip{$_} = 1;
> }
> 
> chomp would remove newline symbol (on Unix it's "\n") reading from the 
> original file.
> 


--
